solution_line_template: Therefore, the price of a Reuben is ${reuben_price} because {numerator_for_reuben_price} / {denominator_for_reuben_price} =<<{numerator_for_reuben_price}/{denominator_for_reuben_price}={reuben_price}>>{reuben_price}
The price of pastrami is ${pastrami_price} because {reuben_price} + {pastrami_extra_cost} = <<{pastrami_price}={pastrami_price}>>{pastrami_price}
